title: How do you deal with Riven's early game?

replies.body:
If you're going full ham, going Doran's blade is quite good with the typical 15AD runes. Otherwise going longsword and 3 health pots with maybe a lifesteal quint or two can be a good choice.

Riven really suffers at the hands of Ryzes and Quinns who deserve no spot at top.
You have to auto between q

You have to be very good at trading and good with her mechanics to do something.

not just spamm qqq we randomly

I have only played her once or twice in the past 4 months, building her bruiser because why not

Depends who you are laning against. Against a tank like Nasus or Mundo or someone you can bully early you can probably start Dorans Blade + pot.

If you have an ignite, Riven can all-in almost anyone at level 3, provided you go in at the correct time. Minion wave in your favour, stunning them at the right time, and using your shield correctly.
Play smart make sure the majority of dmg you take is absorbed by shield and usually the best start will be long and 3 pots.
